rows.label: qev090904_MSG0001
rows.name: Well hey there, H.B., hope I didn't keep you waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0002
rows.name: C-Commander?! What are you doing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0003
rows.name:
I came to put an end to the little upstart
gunning for my position. Personally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0004
rows.name: ...Nah, just kiddin'. I'm here to hand out the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0005
rows.name: Consider yourself lucky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0005_2
rows.name:
It's not every day a BLADE gets paid
by the boss man himself, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0006
rows.name: ...Er, what's the angle?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0006_2
rows.name:
You told me I wasn't to accept work
as a BLADE for the time being.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0007
rows.name:
You think I don't know a wiseass little upstart
like you is gonna ignore that order?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0008
rows.name:
That punch was just my way of clearin' out the cobwebs.
Givin' ya a little push![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0009
rows.name:
And from what Lara Nara told me, it worked.
...That, or I reset your brain, heh heh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0010
rows.name:
Anyway, this is for you.
I added a special bonus, just this once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0011
rows.name: Sorry to keep making you babysit the wonder kid here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0012
rows.name:
But he really does have all kinds of potential,
plus a pound of guts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0013
rows.name:
So the next time he says something stupid,
just give him a little push, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090904_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Vandham to leave it to you.

rows.label: qev090904_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev090904_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that Vandham can do his own punching.

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ha! I knew you were the right person for the job!
See ya when I see ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0015
rows.name: Me? Sorry, but I've got my own work to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0016
rows.name: Commanding doesn't leave me any free time to play nanny.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0017
rows.name: But I know you'll do fine. See ya when I see ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0018
rows.name: Commander, wait![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0019
rows.name:
Don't think any of this changes the way
I feel about your methods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0020
rows.name: Hah! Oh, I know it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0021
rows.name:
Though that whole bit about the segregated divisions?
Just between us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0022
rows.name: I feel the same as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0023
rows.name:
I don't like forcing folks into little boxes
any more than you do, believe me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0024
rows.name:
If an eager beaver like you wants to tackle a job,
I say go for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0025
rows.name:
But revampin' an entire work force with all kinds
of different specializations ain't so simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0026
rows.name:
So if you want to "fix" things,
you'd better become commander fast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0027
rows.name: Otherwise, I might just beat ya to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0028
rows.name: That was...unexpected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0029
rows.name:
If I might ask, who do you feel is the greater talentâ€”
the commander or me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_JNK0030
rows.name: Say Vandham

rows.label: qev090904_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell H.B. that Vandham is by far the superior talent.

rows.label: qev090904_JNK0040
rows.name: Say H.B.

rows.label: qev090904_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell H.B. that he is superior.

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0030
rows.name: I thank you for your candor. I'm entirely in agreement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0031
rows.name:
Even I can see that is empty flattery.
I have a long way to go before that day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0032
rows.name:
But I'm not giving up.
A good hurdle ought to be just shy of insurmountable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0033
rows.name: I'm confident you and I will pass the old dog up yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0034
rows.name: Then it will fall on us to keep the people of New LA safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090904_MSG0035
rows.name: ...Logically and efficiently, of course.[ST:wait ]
